summary: Add spark particle effects on bullet impacts, obstacle/boss obstacle deaths, and player collisions with obstacles/borders.

existing_features.title: Add a dedicated spark-like particle burst visual effect that can be spawned at an (x%, y%) position, with tunable intensity (e.g., normal vs boss/large), and that self-terminates after a short duration without requiring per-frame React state updates.
When a bullet collides with an obstacle, spawn the spark-burst effect at the collision/impact position in addition to any existing hit feedback, and ensure it triggers once per collision event.
When a boss obstacle dies (i.e., when it is removed due to taking the final hit), spawn a higher-intensity spark-burst effect at the boss position at the time of death.

When the player collides with an obstacle or the playfield border (causing player death/game over), spawn a spark-burst effect at the collision position/time, in addition to the existing player explosion sequence.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add spark-like particle effects when bullets hit obstacles/boss obstacles (including on death) and when player collides with obstacles or borders

projectName: Add spark particle bursts on bullet impacts, obstacle/boss deaths, and player collisions
